---
title: "srAnnote@{{title}}"
alias: [<% if ( unread.note && unread.title != unread.note ) { %>"srAnnote@{{note}}",<% } %>"srAnnote@{{title}}"]
author: {{author}}
description: {{{{desc}}
tags: {{tags}}
---

> [!md] Metadata

<% } %>
